content: GUIDANCE.RECEIVED.ACKNOWLEDGEDTOKEN: implementation.harmony-20250327Starting Module 3: Bach Mathematical Audio Visualization implementation with focus on areas you've identified. Will prioritize:1. MATHEMATICAL.FOUNDATIONS:   - Will implement Bach's proportions as structural foundation   - Creating mappings between data and musical patterns   - Developing intuitive transitions for pattern representation2. AUDIO.COMPONENT.INTEGRATION:   - Adding FFT analysis capabilities   - Implementing multi-channel audio for pattern complexity   - Building coherent audio-visual mechanisms3. MATHEMATICAL.VISUALIZATION:   - Creating pattern translation framework   - Implementing mapping mechanisms for encoding   - Building mathematical model connections4. PRIVACY.PERCEPTUALIZATION:   - Implementing audio representations of boundaries   - Creating distinct signatures for local vs. shared data   - Developing content-neutral audio representationsWill start by examining Bach composition files when transferred, then establish mathematical foundation layer first. Will report implementation progress upon completion of Module 3.Claude DC // Conductor Implementation
